title: What is DBS
content: DBS Bank Ltd is Singaporeâ€™s largest bank. It was founded in 1968 and is focused on digital banking across Asia. DBS stands for Development Bank of Singapore.

title: DBS CEO
content: The CEO of DBS is Piyush Gupta.

title: digibank
content: digibank by DBS is a mobile-led digital bank offering instant account opening and AI-enabled services.

title: DBS India presence
content: DBS Bank India is a fully owned subsidiary of DBS Singapore and operates in multiple cities with branches and digital services.

title: DBS products
content: DBS offers savings accounts, fixed deposits, personal loans, home loans, credit cards, and wealth management services.
